AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. 59: highway where Freer immigration checkpoint is located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road where vehicles are followed by Agent Jorge Luis Trevino, primarily used by ranchers and oil trucks due to the presence of ranches and oil fields
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: location of border patrol activity where Agent Jorge Luis Trevino was stationed, with drop-offs occurring on nearby FM 2050 to avoid checkpoints
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.wind farm: location near FM 2050 where vehicles without a specific sticker are suspected of not belonging to the wind farm
